title: Manufacturing Process Engineer Intern, Summer 2024

pay_input_ranges.title: Salary Range
pay_input_ranges.blurb: The US base salary range for this internship position is the salary range below + benefits. Wing’s salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your location during the hiring process.

content:
About Wing: 
Wing offers drone delivery as a safe, fast, and sustainable solution for last mile logistics. Consumer appetites for on-demand services are increasing, but current delivery methods are inefficient, costly, and contribute to road accidents and air pollution. Wing’s fleet of autonomous delivery drones can transport small packages directly from businesses to homes on-demand, in minutes. We design, build, and operate our aircraft, and offer drone delivery services on three continents. Our technology is designed to be easy to integrate into existing delivery and logistics networks, offering a scalable drone delivery solution for a broad range of businesses. Wing is a part of Google's parent company, Alphabet, and our mission is to create the preferred means of delivery for the planet. To do this, we must build a workforce that's representative of the global communities that we serve. If you're ready to do the greatest work of your life, come join us.About Wing:
Wing offers drone delivery as a safe, fast, and sustainable solution for last mile logistics. Consumer appetites for on-demand services are increasing, but current delivery methods are inefficient, costly, and contribute to road accidents and air pollution. Wing’s fleet of autonomous delivery drones can transport small packages directly from businesses to homes on-demand, in minutes. We design, build, and operate our aircraft, and offer drone delivery services on three continents. Our technology is designed to be easy to integrate into existing delivery and logistics networks, offering a scalable drone delivery solution for a broad range of businesses. Wing is a part of Google's parent company, Alphabet, and our mission is to create the preferred means of delivery for the planet. To do this, we must build a workforce that's representative of the global communities that we serve. If you're ready to do the greatest work of your life, come join us.
About the Program:
Wing is hosting a 12 week paid internship during the summer of 2024. It will be an in-person, hybrid internship based in Palo Alto, CA with start dates either in May or June. Eligible candidates must be a current student enrolled in a degree program and intend to return to the program after the completion of the summer internship. 
About the Opportunity:
Wing is looking for an intern to join our Manufacturing Process team based in Palo Alto, CA. Our team develops and delivers manufacturing lines that produce the drones for Wing’s operation. The selected candidate will work closely with our team and contract manufacturers (CM) overseas to contribute to the following projects:
NPI
Develop an assembly process of a product
Develop process flow and SOP
CM bring up
Support line validation activities (i.e. fixture, SOP)
Design DOEs to collect and analyze data in order to assess the performance of the line 
Continuous Improvement
Perform process analysis (i.e. cycle time, FPY) in order to identify bottlenecks
Perform root cause analysis and develop countermeasures
The scope of work will vary depending on the candidate’s interest / experience, the team’s schedule, and the project phase at the time of internship.
What You’ll Need: 
Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Manufacturing Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field, graduating between December 2024 and August 2025
Proficient in SolidWorks, or similar 3D CAD software
Strong problem solving skill
Ability to work in a collaborative team with excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
Bonus: 
Experience working in a manufacturing environment
Experience in developing process flow diagrams, SOPs, and DOEs
Passion for aviation, drones, or related technologies
Knowledge in GD&T and datum precedence rule
Familiarity with statistics and Cpk analysis
The US base salary range for this internship position is the salary range below + benefits. Wing’s salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your location during the hiring process.Salary Range$105,000—$127,000 USD
